segments.text: Eight o'clock . It's time for you to get up and have breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my God ! I'm going to be late ! I have no time to have breakfast now . ( Hurry on his clothes . )
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't go to work today , Steven , It's Sunday . Come and have breakfast now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I have a poor memory now . I haven't had enough sleep lately . I had a bad dream just now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have been too tired recently , darling . That's why I didn't wake you up this morning . After breakfast , you can go to sleep again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I really need to have a good rest .
segments.speaker: S1
